timeline.message:
Add support for Android Keyboard.
This fixes #254

timeline.bodyText: why is this done (again) now in link?
timeline.author: jperedadnr

replies.bodyText:
this is mainly done for Substrate development. In many cases, the launcher.c class is modified. If this is only compiled at compile time, it requires very long cycles.
But I'm ok removing it from the code, if nobody else is working on this.
replies.author: johanvos

replies.bodyText:
I usually have the same issue on iOS. I need to call to compileAdditionalSources, but not the rest of the compile task.
Maybe we need a development flag, and when set, call this method also from AbstractTargetConfiguration::link?
replies.author: jperedadnr

replies.bodyText:
or we can just move it to link in general (for ios and android at least). Or have both.
The compile time for these additional resources is very small compared to the AOT compile time.
replies.author: johanvos

replies.bodyText: Probably the latter (doing it as well from link) won't hurt in any case.
replies.author: jperedadnr

replies.bodyText: ... which is exactly what we have here :)
replies.author: johanvos

replies.bodyText: yes, but only for Android, so maybe it should be for all platforms, in AbstractTargetConfiguration.
replies.author: jperedadnr

timeline.message: always compile addtional sources in link phase

timeline.author: eugener
